headline: Invesco Closed-End Funds Announce Unchanged Distribution Rates for Invesco Senior Income Trust (NYSE: VVR) and Invesco High Income Trust II (NYSE: VLT) and Declare Dividends
summary: The Board of Trustees authorized several Invesco closed-end funds to declare dividends.
